name: Space Wars (itch) (Tibo01)
description:
(3th LEVEL broken in Webgl, try windows or just exit to main menu after completing)
Major modifications:

- Powerups: speed boost and rapid fire with unique textures

- Friendly units: non-hostile units with unique behavior and model (fights off enemies and follows player), 

- 3 unique, fast paced levels

( enemy AI adjusted for friendly units + collisions among units)
